unnormalised: Aiyo, return policies, such a headache! Last Onam, I ordered a saree from that new online store, right? Turns out, the color was totally off. Thankfully, their return was smooth. Now, imagine returning something from a store in Chandni Chowk! Nightmare! Good policies build trust, like a perfect biryani does for a good host.
